'''Supply Notices''' are weekly requests for [[Item]]s from the various [[Natlan Tribes|tribes]] of [[Natlan]]. 

==List of Supply Notices==
Each completed supply notice will award 80 Reputation EXP for the affiliated Tribe and {{Item|Sanctifying Unction|x=2}}.
* {{Item|Cacahuatl|x=10}}
* {{Item|Candlecap Mushroom|x=10}}
* {{Item|Embercore Flower|x=10}}
* {{Item|Grainfruit|x=10}}
* {{Item|Spinel Fruit|x=10}}
* {{Item|Brilliant Chrysanthemum|x=5}}
* {{Item|Quenepa Berry|x=5}}
* {{Item|Saurian Claw Succulent|x=5}}
* {{Item|Sprayfeather Gill|x=5}}
* {{Item|Glowing Hornshroom|x=5}}
* {{Item|Skysplit Gembloom|x=5}}
* {{Item|Dracolite|x=5}}

==Description==
{{Description|Providing the residents of various tribes in Natlan with the supplies they need is one of the most effective ways to support the people.<br>Promptly completing "Supply Notices" at the tribe's Obsidian Totem Pole will increase your reputation in said tribe.<br><br>'''Supply Notices: Contribution Limits and Resetting'''<br>You can only complete a certain number of Supply Notices every week.<br>You can check the number of Supply Notices you've completed this week in the Reputation Menu.<br>The limit of Supply Notices from all of Natlan's tribes is shared with other cities' Residents' Commissions.<br>New Supply Notices will become available every Monday.<br><br>Once your Reputation reaches the maximum level, you can no longer complete new Supply Notices.|Reputation: Supply Notice}}
